Room.Name: Necropolis Administration Office
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the necropolis administration building. Is it a plot you want?
Room.LongDescription: A clerk behind a simple desk greets you as you enter the building. You saw the clerk flinch as you came in, probably surprised that anyone would be here at this time. They must not do much business. The clerk tells you that you can sometimes find the undertaker here, as he is in charge of the Necropolis and probably knows everything you want to know about it. You should speak to him.
